DataElement.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Breast Tissue Expander Performed Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the type of tissue expander placed for breast reconstruction (surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Breast Tissue Expander Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to breast reconstruction (surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy) using a breast tissue expander (an inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction) performed (executed and carried through to completion).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
